title: Single Family Home w/Basement, Laundry, Closets, Backyard! (Cl
posting_body: Welcome to 13509 Courtland Avenue, a beautiful and delightful three-bedroom home that has been properly kept and cared for over the years.
You are welcomed into the spacious living room with newer carpet as soon as you walk through the front entrance with stained glass panels.
From there, you can access the spacious eat-in kitchen, which has formica counters, white oak cabinets, and a ceramic tile backsplash.
This room has a wonderful view of the lovely backyard.
On the main floor, there are two roomy bedrooms with hardwood floors, a modern full bathroom with ceramic tile flooring, and a practical tub/shower combo.
The entire second level is devoted to the roomy Primary Bedroom, which has wood paneled walls and modern carpet.
On the second floor, there is a lot of closet and storage space available, including built-in shelving and an enormous cedar closet to suit your needs.
The partially finished basement provides more living space as well as a big activity room with updated flooring and glass block windows for your enjoyment.
The lower level also has a partial bathroom.
In addition, this house has a great backyard that is completely enclosed by fencing, a detached 1-car garage, and extra storage space.
It is close to the Kamm's Corners area and has easy access to both the Metroparks and the Interstate.
Simple commute to Cleveland's downtown and beyond.
Don't pass up the chance to see everything that this unique home has to offer!
